
C2
Verses in the Book of Matthew That Contain the Name Jehovah as Part of Direct or Indirect Quotations




VERSE

QUOTE OR REFERENCE

SUPPORTING REFERENCES



MATTHEW 3:3

Isaiah 40:3

J1-4, 7-14, 16-18, 20, 22-24, 26, 28-35, 39-42, 46, 48, 49, 52, 53, 56, 57, 59-61, 63, 65, 66, 88, 90, 93-96, 98, 100-102, 104-106, 113-118, 136, 143-147, 149, 154, 155, 164-166, 175, 185, 187, 188, 200, 201, 203, 212, 213, 228, 235, 236, 243, 244, 250, 252, 262, 263, 265, 271, 273, 275, 285, 290, 295-297, 299, 300



MATTHEW 4:4

Deuteronomy 8:3

J1-14, 17, 18, 20, 22, 23, 31, 32, 37, 48, 65, 66, 94, 95, 100, 101, 115-117, 125, 143-147, 157, 163, 167, 236, 262, 263, 285

Deuteronomy 6:16

J1-14, 16-18, 20, 22-24, 28-41, 43, 45-50, 52, 54, 56, 57, 59-63, 65, 66, 88, 90, 93-95, 98-106, 113-118, 122, 125, 128, 130, 133, 136, 138, 143-147, 149, 154, 155, 161, 163-167, 169, 175, 178, 185-187, 190, 194, 200, 201, 203, 205, 206, 209, 210, 212, 213, 217, 221, 223, 226-228, 231, 235-239, 243, 244, 262, 263, 265-268, 271, 273, 275, 279, 286, 287, 290, 295-297

Deuteronomy 6:13
